name: Smart Mummy
description:
Smart Mummy - is a quite difficult 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you have to pass various levels for the mummy. Your main task in this game is to collect vessels with of bodies for the mummy. Once you will collect the right amount of vessels for you will be opened the entrance to the pyramid, after going through which you will be on a new level. Be careful on your way you can find a variety of obstacles, such as scarabs and magic lights. And don't forget that you have only one attempt to help the mummy to get cherished vessels.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Animated graphics.
  • Simple, funny gameplay.
  • A large number of levels.
